articles.author: Lorne Cook
articles.title: The EU says its countermeasures to Trump’s tariffs will go into effect on April 1 - The Associated Press
articles.description: The European Union has announced its own countermeasures, saying they will enter into force from April 1, after the Trump administration officially increased tariffs on all steel and aluminum imports to 25%. European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen …
articles.content: BRUSSELS (AP) The European Union on Wednesday announced retaliatory trade action with a series of duties on U.S. industrial and agricultural products that will go into effect from April 1, responding… [+5339 chars]
